org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy

Class TabularVDBEPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.GreedyPolicy
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.EpsilonGreedyPolicy
        • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.TabularVDBEPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ErrorObserver, Policy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TabularVdbeSoftmaxPolicy

    public class TabularVDBEPolicy
extends EpsilonGreedyPolicy
implements ErrorObserver
    Implementation of the VDBE-Policy from: M. Tokic. Adaptive \varepsilon-greedy exploration in reinforcement learning based on value differences. In R. Dillmann, J. Beyerer, U. Hanebeck, and T. Schultz, editors, KI 2010: Advances in Artificial Intelligence, volume 6359 of Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence, pages 203-210. Springer Berlin / Heidelberg, 2010.
    Author:
    tokicm
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
